content.text: The ferry from Helsinki to Traveumunde leaves Helsinki at 17.30 on a Tuesday
Work out the day and time that the ferry arrives in Traveumunde
From the above word, write down the letters which have
Write the following in order of size, **smallest** first
A lake has an area of \(63 800 000 000\) square metres
Write this area in square kilometres, correct to 2 significant figures
Work out the possible values of \(x\)
The perimeter of the rectangle is the same length as the circumference of the circle
Calculate the radius, \(r\), of the circle
A car company sells a scale model \(\frac{1}{10}\) of the size of one of its cars

Area of windscreen (cm²)135

content.text: The line \(AB\) represents the glass walkway between the Petronas Towers in Kuala Lumpur
The walkway is 58.4 metres long and is 170 metres above the ground
The angle of elevation of the point \(P\) from \(A\) is \(78.3^{\circ}\)
Calculate the height of \(P\) above the ground
Work out the acceleration of the boat in metres/minute²
Calculate the total distance travelled by the boat
The diagram shows the speed-time graph for a boat journey
\(y\) varies directly as the square of \((x - 3)\)
A helicopter flies \(8\mathrm{km}\) due north from \(A\) to \(B\). It then flies \(5\mathrm{km}\) from \(B\) to \(C\) and returns to \(A\)
How far has the taxi travelled?
Taxi fares cost \(30 \%\) more at night
How much does a \(\$ 9\) daytime journey cost at night?
The taxi fare in a city is \(\$ 3\) and then \(\$ 0.40\) for every kilometre travelled
Describe fully the **single** transformation that maps triangle \(A\) onto triangle \(B\)
Find the \(2 \times 2\) matrix which represents this transformation
the probability that the height of a tomato plant, chosen at random, will be more than 15 cm
The cumulative frequency diagram shows information about the heights of 60 tomato plants
Use the graph to solve the equation \(\frac{x}{2} + \frac{2}{x} = 3.\)
By drawing a suitable tangent, work out an estimate of the gradient of the graph where \(x = 1\)
The diagram shows the graph of \(y = \frac{x}{2} + \frac{2}{x}\), for \(0 < x \leqslant 8\)
Find the co-ordinates of the midpoint of the line joining \(A(- 8, 3)\) and \(B(- 2, - 3)\)
The lines \(5x = 4y + 10\) and \(2y = kx - 4\) are parallel
\(\left( \begin{array}{cc}1 & 0 \\ 0 & x - 2 \end{array} \right)\) represents a stretch with factor 3 and the \(x\) axis invariant
Find the values of \(x\) for which
